body: Wow, look at all this new stuff. Certainly didn't expect this much had changed since the last time I had been here (8 months?). high school is hitting hard but I figured I'd come check this out again. Hey folks, hows it going? I'm cold to those who don't know me, and most still here probably know and think I'm annoying me because I used to be an immature brat for the large part. I'd like to think I'm less annoying now though, so hi.
